TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants are NORP nationals . The applicant in the first case , Mr PERSON , was born in DATE and is represented before the ORG by Mr U. Sommer , a lawyer practising in GPE . The applicant in the second case , Mr PERSON , was born in DATE and is represented before the ORG by PERSON , a lawyer practising in ORG . Both applicants are currently serving a prison sentence in GPE .
